name: Aero
description:
First ever Game Jam and entry.. please be gentle ;P

KEYBINDS

  • Mouse - Plane Movement
  • W / S - Plane Pitch
  • A / D - Plane Roll
  • Space - Boost
  • Left CTRL - Air Brake
  • C - Freecam

GAMEPLAY

Your goal is to rack up as much points as possible by flying your plane through holes and gaps in the terrain.

Regain speed by picking up the blue orbs and getting close calls with the floor and holes to keep on going before you'll be a burning wreck on some cliffside!

Don't go too slow though, you might fall out of the sky ;D
